description:
When you purchase this DLC:

- You get a Music Player in the “Random Mode”. A selection of 15 tracks from the “Story Mode” + 3 exclusive ones are available to play in the background.

- Nakana.io will donate their net revenues generated by your purchase to the UN Refugees Agency. It provides protection, shelter, health and education to the millions of people who have been forced to flee from their homes and restart their lives.

“We sympathize with the refugees, returnees, stateless people, internally displaced and asylum-seekers and hope to provide them support with your contribution. The in-game content you receive is all about music, because it’s a passion of the developer Talha Kaya.” - Kayabros and Nakana.io

Visit the website of Nakana.io to see in more detail how we use the money received from the DLC sales.
name: Soul-Soothing Donation
